verses.name: Job 28:24
verses.text: For he looketh to the ends of the earth, and seeth under the whole heaven;

verses.name: Job 28:25
verses.text: To make the weight for the winds; and he weigheth the waters by measure.

verses.name: Job 28:26
verses.text: When he made a decree for the rain, and a way for the lightning of the thunder:

verses.name: Job 28:27
verses.text: Then did he see it, and declare it; he prepared it, yea, and searched it out.

verses.name: Job 28:28
verses.text: And unto man he said, Behold, the fear of the Lord, that is wisdom; and to depart from evil is understanding.
